post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
Broken material shaders are usually the result of missing image files. Either edit all the broken shaders to point to files that exist or create dummy image files to take the place of the missing ones.

More information on material shaders can be gathered from here...

http://www.modwiki.net/wiki/Material_%28decl%29

Outside of that, I can't guarantee any of the files use the same structure and given this is a bit of a grey area topic you're on your own.
